TopicTitle: New Landing Gear Wheels by Porkjet

Articles.Content:
These look awesome!

![OdKmZ9i.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OdKmZ9i.jpg)

[http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2wm2j5/lets_get_you_rolling/](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/2wm2j5/lets_get_you_rolling/)

They see me rollin, they hatin!

I am so pumped for these! not only the large landing gear, but the small ones as well!

Lightyear - get rollin ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

And I like the static wheels as well. ThatÃ‚Â´s a great idea for tier 1 landing gears.
Are we getting 4 different types? Excellent! That small one looks like it could have many other non-aircraft uses.
Finally our large aircraft will no longer look like fat hulks with twig legs!
Very cool. They look a bit old fashioned for a space program though.
Oh, YES to the smaller, static landing gear. I like building small (very small) air vehicles, and have been stuck using Vernor engines as landing gear to make the vehicle not 60% landing gear.

> 
> Oh, YES to the smaller, static landing gear. I like building small (very small) air vehicles, and have been stuck using Vernor engines as landing gear to make the vehicle not 60% landing gear.

I love the tiny gear. now we can make a jet Cessna!
delicious

> 
> They see me rollin, they hatin!

I know they're all thinkin' I'm so

Green and nerdy

Think I'm just too green and nerdy

Think I'm just too green and nerdy

Can't you see I'm green and nerdy?

Look at me, I'm green and nerdy

> 
> I love the tiny gear. now we can make a jet Cessna!

With KAX (Kerbal Aircraft Expansion), I have created an accurate Cessna 172 (All stock except the propeller), but the landing gear of course looks a bit odd. These static gear will be awesome!!

Nice to see more gear. For those who are not aware, also check out "Adjustable Landing Gear".

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-0-25-Adjustable-Landing-Gear-v1-0-4%28doors-fixed%29-Nov-14](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-0-25-Adjustable-Landing-Gear-v1-0-4%28doors-fixed%29-Nov-14)

![cm7mMXa.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/cm7mMXa.jpg)

With that, plus the use of "Tweakscale" to get almost any desired size, it's darned good. 

- GeorgeG

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-21T03:07:13Z" title="02/21/2015 03:07  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 21, 2015</time> by GeorgeG**

**Tail gear!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!**

Now I can die like a real pilot while landing instead of on takeoff.
I want to make a go-kart with those little wheels. I wish it wasn't so far off!
Now if we can get some more varied engines and an open cockpit, my aeroplane dreams will be complete.

> 
> Nice to see more gear. For those who are not aware, also check out "Adjustable Landing Gear".
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-0-25-Adjustable-Landing-Gear-v1-0-4%28doors-fixed%29-Nov-14](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-0-25-Adjustable-Landing-Gear-v1-0-4%28doors-fixed%29-Nov-14)
> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/cm7mMXa.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/cm7mMXa.jpg)
> 
> With that, plus the use of "Tweakscale" to get almost any desired size, it's darned good. 
> 
> - GeorgeG

Is that why it looked familiar...

> 
> Now if we can get some more varied engines and an open cockpit, my aeroplane dreams will be complete.

I think I could get by with one simple prop engine an a T-6 Texan style cockpit for starting tech in career.
I just noticed that the wheel in the bottom left corner looks like a duck.

Despite not really liking to make real world replicas, im so gonna make a B17 with those wheels (heck thy so fit the whole WW2 bomber theme) and the small ones for biplanes.

Now all we need are bloody propellers.

> 
> Now all we need are bloody propellers.

Just let Bob stand on the runway...
I really, really like the one with 2 axles. I wish there was a 3 axle version for really big planes though.

> 
> I wish there was a 3 axle version for really big planes though.

What I do to achieve this effect is to place another landing gear either beside or in front/behind the existing one to achieve that effect. It may not be as pretty, but it works haha!

Sidenote: Still loving the Editor gizmos!
Lightgear, Yet rollin'!

Wow. I thought we were just getting one new landing gear and maybe a remodel of the one we already have, not 4 more! Great work guys!

Those tiny gears... I can see them being useful for ion gliders or high speed rovers.
Great news to roll on, into the weekend!
